mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(diary_regDate) AS diary_count, DATE_FORMAT(diary_regDate, '%Y-%m-%d') AS diary_date, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM diary d2 WHERE DATE_FORMAT(d2.diary_regDate, '%Y-%m') = DATE_FORMAT(diary.diary_regDate, '%Y-%m')) AS monthly_count FROM diary GROUP BY DATE_FORMAT(diary_regDate, '%Y-%m-%d') ORDER BY diary_date;
